short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A better logging format tool thing for Agilefant

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A better way to log your hours in agilefant! 
Use this tool to conform to the logging standard set by SENG302.
This tool to creates a nicely formatted log message, which is copied to your clipboard for you to enter into Agilefant!
No more writing draft log messages in Word, or losing marks due to forgetting that crucial hashtag!
